chinese: 这些橡皮小鸭漂浮在水面上
english: these rubber ducks are floating on the water

chinese: 他办理了抵押贷款，这意味着他是借钱买的房子
english: he took out a mortgage, meaning he borrowed money to buy his home

chinese: 消防队员把水管对准着火处，希望把火扑灭
english: Firemen pointed the hose at the fire, hoping to put it out

chinese: 老师给了这个淘气的男孩都违纪处分
english: the teacher is taking disciplinary actions against the naughty boy

chinese: 我们部门的四个小组必须全力推进新项目
english: our department's four teams must integrate together to work on new projects

chinese: 沿海城市时常面临飓风来袭的危险
english: cities near the ocean often face the risk of hurricanes

chinese: 董事长善款失踪后，公司陷入了混乱
english: the company was in turmoil after the chairman disappeared with all the money

chinese: 手工艺品中往往包含了熟练的手工制作
english: crafts usually involve making things skillfully with one's hands

chinese: 树林里面的空气尤为潮湿
english: the air is particularly humid in the forest

chinese: 挂在墙上的装饰性花朵看上去很漂亮
english: the decorative flowers hung on the wall look lovely

chinese: 这个人正在向大家提倡节约用水
english: the man is advocating that we should save water

chinese: 一位老师和一些学生正在开数学研讨会
english: a teacher and some students are attending a math seminar

chinese: 这女孩儿总能想出一些具有创新意义的新点子
english: this girl always comes up with new and innovative ideas
